page.title: 19ADVENTURE CENTRE MELKSHAM
page.content: The Adventure Centre offers many activities like sea side visits, dancing, drumming, swimming, pool, rounders, football, walking, rock climbing, climbing, camping, canoeing and ice skating at Bristol. The canoes are provided for us and there are about 31. We go out on the River Avon which runs along side the centre. It is a sort of Youth Club with 150 people. It costs Â£3 to join and 20p per week. The club also has jumble sales and fetes. The money from them goes towards good causes. I think this club is a good idea because it keeps young people occupied.
